resources.string: The Googleplex is the corporate headquarters complex of Google and its parent company Alphabet Inc..\"Googleplex\" is a portmanteau of Google and complex (meaning a complex of buildings) and a reference to googolplex, the name given to the large number 10(10100), or 10googol.

Apple Park is the corporate headquarters of Apple Inc. Its circular design and extreme scale have earned a media nickname of \"the spaceship\". Located on a suburban site totaling 175 acres (71 hectares), it houses more than 12,000 employees in one central four-storied circular building of approximately 2,800,000 square feet (260,000 square meters).

The Intel Museum located at Intel\'s headquarters has exhibits of Intel\'s products and history as well as semiconductor technology in general. The museum was started in the early 1980s as an internal project at Intel to record its history.

One of the biggest reasons that we keep seeing new startups pop up in Silicon Valley is because they are is continually replenished with new engineers. Where are all these new engineers coming from, you may ask? The first place to look is one of the top-rated universities in the worldâ€“Stanford University.
